column4: yea I get it, thats a good idea for next install... I think ill wait on the 64bit for a little while
i'm running 64 bit 5.04 hoary right now...
that's a good idea... there are still some bugs that need to be worked out... hopefully they will be fixed by April 6
What mobo do you have? Cause 4.10 doesent seem to like my DFI nf4 mobo
I have the (notorious) Asus ASN-SLI w/ that new nforce4 chipset
ohhhhh you have nforce4 also...
the latest kernel patches are supposed to solve all the problems w/that
i'm using the quick fix tricks to get it to work right now in hoary...
I see... Ill have to download hoary when its fully out
read my post (rdw200169) @ linuxquestions.com if you want to try 64 bit right away... http://www.linuxquestions.org/questions/showthread.php?s=&postid=1561140#post1561140
what video card are you running?
gigabyte one
you're in luck... Hoary comes w/ nvidia drivers that work w/that video card
Sweet
Have you tryed the new dx9 wine cvs?
no, i generally run cedega
It fully supports hl2 (among others) ive been told. Better then cedega.
interesting... i've never even heard of it!.. do you have the website available?
http://games.slashdot.org/games/05/03/28/1843246.shtml?tid=203&tid=106
http://www.linux-gamers.net/modules/news/article.php?storyid=749 (as linked in the article)
